comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: According to Wikipedia, George Lewis "Tex" Rickard was an "American boxing promoter, founder of the New York Rangers National Hockey League (NHL) franchise, and builder of the third incarnation of Madison Square Garden in New York City."

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks bior, we'll add his full name to our records.
